thread.title: Ex-football coach Barry Bennell denies sex assault charges
thread.title_full: Ex-football coach Barry Bennell denies sex assault charges

title: Ex-football coach Barry Bennell denies sex assault charges
text:
Read more about sharing. Close share panel Former football coach Barry Bennell has pleaded not guilty to eight charges of sexual assault against a boy under 14. 
The former youth coach at Crewe Alexandra denied the eight counts when he appeared at Chester Crown Court. 
The charges all relate to allegations of abuse between 1981 and 1986. 
Bennell, 63, wearing a blue polo neck shirt and appearing via videolink from HMP Woodhill, in Milton Keynes, answered "not guilty" to all the charges as they were put to him.
